name: poll-api-java
description: Poll API in Java for final project of UNSJ

scripts.deploy: SLS_DEBUG=* npm i && npm run mvn && sls deploy --force --aws-profile awsTesis --region us-east-1 --stage tesis
scripts.package: npm i && sls package --aws-profile awsTesis --region us-east-1 --stage tesis
scripts.mvn: mvn clean && mvn install && mvn package

author: Matias Rodriguez
